alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 12:15AM EST until January 25 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Jefferson county. Greatest ice accumulations across the Tug Hill Plateau and near the Saint Lawrence River. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will result in slippery roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.
